pylint_report
==============

:ref:`genindex`, :ref:`modindex`

.. only:: html

  :Release: |version|
  :Date: |today|

  utest_, coverage_, lint_

  ------------------------------------------------------

.. _utest: .utest_reports/utest_report.html
.. _coverage: .htmlcov/index.html
.. _lint: .pylint_report.html

The repository is aviailable at `pylint_report
<https://github.com/drdv/pylint-report>`_. It can be used to generate an HTML report
summarizing the results of `pylint <https://www.pylint.org/>`_.
